item.title: 山姆-奥特曼说 2026 年可能是人工智能的大年
item.description:
在 The Circuit with Emily Chang的这篇扩展访谈中，OpenAI 首席执行官解释了星际之门项目如何融入科学发现的未来。【原文：

On this extended interview from The Circuit with Emily Chang, the OpenAI CEO explains how the Stargate project fits into the future of scientific discovery.

】

item.title: 红杉领投工业软件初创公司 7500 万美元交易
item.description:
Nominal 希望让国防、能源和制造领域的公司更轻松地开发新产品。【原文：

Nominal wants to make it easier for companies in defense, energy and manufacturing to develop new products. 

】

item.title: 世界杯赛事刺激旅游需求，Airbnb 将提供 FIFA 主题体验
item.description: Airbnb 公司正与国际足联（FIFA）合作，利用世界杯赛举办城市旅游需求的增长，为足球迷提供限时、由名人主导的活动。【原文：Airbnb Inc. is partnering with FIFA to offer limited-time, celebrity-led activities for soccer fans, taking advantage of an uptick in travel demand in cities hosting World Cup tournaments.】

item.title: Bose 推出带无线充电功能的新款 QuietComfort 耳机
item.description: 音频硬件品牌 Bose 公司发布了三款新产品，包括降噪耳塞和两款不同的便携式蓝牙扬声器。【原文：Audio hardware brand Bose Corp. unveiled three new products, including noise-canceling earbuds and two different portable Bluetooth speakers.】

item.title: OpenAI 的 Simo 表示，聊天 GPT 应覆盖数十亿用户
item.description: OpenAI 即将上任的应用主管 Fidji Simo 说，她认为 ChatGPT 的客户群将扩大到数十亿用户。【原文：OpenAI’s incoming head of applications, Fidji Simo, said she sees growing ChatGPT’s customer base to billions of users.】

item.title: 美国重复申请失业救济人数跃升至 2021 年底以来最高点
item.description: 美国失业救济金的经常性申请上升至 2021 年底以来的最高点，这进一步证明美国失业者需要更长的时间才能找到新工作。【原文：Recurring applications for US unemployment benefits rose to the highest since the end of 2021, adding to evidence that it is taking unemployed Americans longer to find a new job.】

item.title: 头号种植国巴西霜冻风险低，咖啡跌幅扩大
item.description: 阿拉比卡咖啡期货连续第三天下跌，并创下自6月4日以来的最低收盘价，原因是人们乐观地认为，冬季气温较低将有助于最大的生产国巴西提前收获。【原文：Arabica coffee futures fell for a third day and headed for their lowest close since June 4 amid optimism that milder winter temperatures will help advance harvesting in biggest producer Brazil.】

item.title: 美国 5 月生产者价格涨幅低于预期
item.description: 美国 5 月份的生产者价格通胀依然低迷，商品和服务成本的下降抑制了通胀。【原文：US producer price inflation remained muted in May, held down by tame goods and services costs.】

item.title: 雅虎试图通过人工智能使其邮件服务重新发挥作用
item.description: 雅虎正在为其电子邮件平台推出新的人工智能功能，以更好地吸引其快速增长的用户群：Z 世代和千禧一代。【原文：Yahoo is rolling out new artificial intelligence features for its email platform in an effort to better engage one of its fast-growing subset of users: Gen Z and millennials.】

item.title: 从人工智能到关税，苹果面临的十大挑战
item.description: 苹果公司长期以来一直是硅谷同行羡慕的对象，如今却面临着后乔布斯时代最艰难的时期之一。【原文：Apple Inc., long the envy of its Silicon Valley peers, is now facing one of the most trying times of the post-Steve Jobs era.】

item.title: 特斯拉起诉前 Optimus 工程师，指控其窃取机器人商业机密
item.description: 特斯拉公司起诉了该公司高度机密的 Optimus 项目的一名前工程师，指控他窃取人形机器人的机密信息，并在硅谷成立了一家竞争对手的初创公司。【原文：Tesla Inc. sued a former engineer with the company’s highly secretive Optimus program, accusing him of stealing confidential information about the humanoid robot and setting up a rival startup in Silicon Valley.】

item.title: 特朗普寻求速战速决，习近平却在中美贸易问题上玩起了长线游戏
item.description: 当唐纳德-特朗普为伦敦贸易谈判的结果欢呼雀跃时，习近平却得到了一个低调的战略收获：谈判进程为中国赢得了时间，有助于化解更多有害关税和技术限制的威胁。【原文：While Donald Trump hailed the outcome of trade talks in London, Xi Jinping walked away with an understated strategic gain: a negotiating process that buys China time and helps defuse the threat of more harmful tariffs and technology curbs.】

item.title: 英国的核赌注显示了卷土重来的代价
item.description:
关于将原子能用于数据中心和人工智能的讨论不绝于耳，但 Sizewell C 却证明这并非易事。【原文：

For all the talk about using atomic power for data centers and artificial intelligence, Sizewell C proves it won’t be so easy. 

】

item.title: 信实工业以 9 亿美元剥离亚洲涂料股份
item.description: 据周四提交的一份交易所文件显示，信实工业有限公司通过大宗交易出售股份，剥离了亚洲涂料有限公司约 3.7% 的股份，共筹集资金 770 亿卢比（约合 9 亿美元）。【原文：Reliance Industries Ltd. divested about 3.7% stake in Asian Paints Ltd. by selling shares in a block trade, raising 77 billion rupees ($900 million), according to an exchange filing on Thursday.】

item.title: 贵金属上涨推动多种非洲货币走高
item.description: 贵金属价格的飙升正在帮助一些非洲货币从年初的疲软中反弹。【原文：A surge in the price of precious metals is helping several African currencies to rebound from a weak start to the year.】

item.title: 德国重要天然气储存地再充气计划以失败告终
item.description: 德国最大的天然气储存设施之一在最近一次拍卖中未能找到买家，因此德国为在明年冬季之前填满其庞大的天然气储存设施而展开的竞赛正进入紧要关头。【原文：Germany’s race to fill its vast gas storage sites ahead of next winter is entering crunch time after one of the country’s largest facilities failed to find buyers during its latest auction.】

item.title: 捷克总统警告称，如果没有欧元，捷克可能会 "落后"。
item.description: 捷克总统彼得-帕维尔（Petr Pavel）呼吁捷克采用欧元，以促进贸易，避免被排除在货币联盟成员的关键决策之外。【原文：Czech President Petr Pavel called for the country to adopt the euro as a way to help trade and avoid being left out of key decisions made by members of the currency union.】

item.title: 印度通胀进一步降温，支持印度央行大幅降息
item.description: 印度的通胀率在 5 月份进一步放缓，连续第七个月下降，验证了央行上周出人意料的大幅降息。【原文：India’s inflation eased further in May, marking a seventh consecutive monthly decline and validating the central bank’s unexpectedly large interest rate cut last week.】

item.title: Meta 因打击深度伪造裸体应用程序而起诉香港公司
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司正在起诉一家香港企业，指控其推广所谓的 "裸体应用"（nudify apps）。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. is suing a Hong Kong-based business for allegedly promoting so-called nudify apps, as the Facebook owner attempts to combat a surge in naked and sexual images created by artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 中东地区发出警告后，油轮巨头保持冷静和谨慎
item.description: 全球最大的几家远洋油轮运营商表示，在海军部队对在世界最大产油区波斯湾及其周边地区作业的船只发出风险警告后，他们保持冷静但谨慎的态度。【原文：Several of the world’s largest ocean-tanker operators said they remained calm but cautious after risk warnings from naval forces for vessels operating in and around the Persian Gulf, the world’s largest oil-producing region.】

item.title: Netflix 联席首席执行官认为华纳的分拆是更大范围 "动荡 "的一部分
item.description: Netflix 公司联席首席执行官格雷格-彼得斯（Greg Peters）说，华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros. Discovery Inc.【原文：Warner Bros. Discovery Inc.’s decision to split into two independent companies is a sign of a broader “shakeout” across a media industry that has become increasingly dominated by streaming and on-demand services, Netflix Inc. co-Chief Executive Officer Greg Peters said.】

item.title: 欧洲央行施纳贝尔称降息运动即将结束
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员伊莎贝尔-施纳贝尔（Isabel Schnabel）表示，欧洲中央银行的降息运动可能很快就会结束，通货膨胀和经济都将步入正轨。【原文：The European Central Bank’s interest-rate cutting campaign may soon be over, with inflation and the economy both on track, Executive Board member Isabel Schnabel said.】

item.title: 北欧联合银行宣布今年第三次 2.5 亿欧元回购计划
item.description: 北欧联合银行（Nordea Bank Abp）新的 2.5 亿欧元（2.89 亿美元）股票回购计划已获得欧洲中央银行批准，这是今年迄今为止的第三个此类计划。【原文：Nordea Bank Abp has received approval from the European Central Bank for a new €250 million ($289 million) share buyback program, the third of its kind so far this year.】

item.title: 塞尔维亚意外维持利率不变，谨慎情绪压倒增长步伐
item.description: 塞尔维亚中央银行出人意料地连续第九个月保持借贷成本不变，在通胀缓解和经济增长放缓的情况下仍坚持谨慎的政策方针。【原文：Serbia’s central bank unexpectedly kept borrowing costs unchanged for a ninth month, sticking to a cautious policy approach even as inflation eases and economic growth slows.】
